name: Le Petit Leon- Zig Zag
description:
Standing 17" tall, this one-of-a-kind plush lion is handmade in our Portland, Oregon studio.  He is stuffed with recycled Wellspring fiber which is also locally made from reclaimed plastic soda bottles.  His body is composed of 100% cotton fabric and his mane and face are constructed from a wool and rayon felt blend.

Please note that our La Petit Leon line is recommended for children ages three and up.

All images and text copyright olbapi! 2009
